topic.title: Populating the Patch Storage Area
topic.shortdesc:
Patches have to be uploaded to the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade patch storage area
before they can be applied.

li.p: Log in as Keystone user admin to the active controller.

Log in as user wrsroot to the active controller and source the script
/etc/nova/openrc to obtain
administrative privileges as described in .
Upload the patch file to the patch storage area.

This example uploads a single patch to the storage area. You
can specify multiple patch files on the same command separating their names
with spaces.

Alternatively, you can upload all patch files stored in a directory using a
single command, as illustrated in the following example:

The patch files are available now in the patch storage area, but they have
not yet been applied to the cluster.
